sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import { Button } from '../ButtonElement'; import { InfoSectionContainer, InfoSectionWrapper, InfoSectionRow, Column1, Column2, TextWrapper, TopLine, Heading, Subtitle, BtnWrap, ImgWrap, Img } from './InfoSectionElements'; const InfoSection = ({lightBg, id, imgStart, topLine, lightText, headline, darkText, description, buttonLabel, img, alt}) => { return ( <> {topLine} {headline} {description} ) } export default InfoSection;
